summary: A talented but brash stunt pilot enters the Marine Corps and becomes more disciplined.

Davidson|Ward Bond|Edward Brophy|Helen Flint|William Bailey|William Begg|Carlyle Blackwell Jr.|Joseph Crehan|George Bernard Dilley Sr.|Bill Elliott|Dick French|Samuel S. title: Diablos del aire
